entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new install should not pull down pre-release packages by default #34911
  • Having a tests project in a subfolder of the main application causes a recursive generation of artifacts #34914
  • .NET MAUI quick up-to-date check is broken because launchSettings.json is erroneously included in expected #34888

Closed

  • [API Compat] Changing a member return type should be detected as a breaking change #34864
    9.0.1xx
  • Regression - NET8 Preview1 SDK won't publish trimmed self contained solution with netstandard2.1 projects #30948
    .NET 8.0
  • [API Compat] Add extension method validation #34824

PullRequests

Created

  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Add internal _UseManagedNtlm feature switch #34903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #34893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Validate member types #34872
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Enable Windows thread pool config switch via Project file #34889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Removing stale msbuild feed #34899
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate "this" extension methods and limit visibility #34871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2251820 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Containers: prefer starting the app using 'dotnet <assembly.dll>'. #34863
    untriaged, Area-Containers
